subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Werber was a link to the Yankees of Babe Ruth and Lou Gehrig and was the leadoff hitter in the first major league baseball game to be televised.
snippet: Mr. Werber was a link to the Yankees of Babe Ruth and Lou Gehrig and was the leadoff hitter in the first major league baseball game to be televised.
